name: Flicker (itch) (oolimry)
description:
I'm sorry, but I can only sustain this flickering light for you.
Flicker - A top down action set in a dark space with only a flicker

Flicker is made for the Ludum Dare 51 Jam for the theme "Every 10 Seconds". (Edit: the link to the Ludum Dare page is here)
